message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm not sure if I can go up to $13,000.

Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I value your interest, $11,000 is a bit lower than what I'm hoping for. I'm willing to come down to $12,000, as a compromise. This would still be a great deal for you, given the value you place on the product. Let me know if you're willing to consider this.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $11,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
